title: Several fonts on website
content:
Hi. I am wondering what these font are. They seem familiar but can’t find a matching one.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonts.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122524/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_2.gif) | 186.41 KB |

 [‹ (x) very large lowercase c - Big Caslon {Brandon S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122524/http:/typophile.com/node/40322 "Go to previous forum topic") [Piae cantiones ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122524/http:/typophile.com/node/40318 "Go to next forum topic")
author: r4v

comments.content: The one that says “Recent news” is Georgia. I believe the sans that says “Company Name” is Helvetica.
Thanks. Could someone tell me what #5 is?
